feed.title: Tung Do
feed.subtitle:
I am a research resident at [VinAI](https://www.vinai.io/vinai-ai-residency/), advised by [Prof. Binh-Son Hua](https://sonhua.github.io/) (primary) and [Dr. Rang Nguyen](https://rangnguyen.github.io/) (secondary).
Before that, I received a B.Eng. degree in Computer Engineering at the [University of Information Technology - VNUHCM](https://en.uit.edu.vn/).
